sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' import axios from 'axios' function ProductScreen({ }) { const { id } = useParams(); // <-- id is string const product = products.find(p => String(p._id) === id); // <-- convert `p._id` to string return (
Indietro

{product.name}

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 1 ? 'Disponibile' : 'Esaurito'}
) } export default ProductScreen
